combat1.name: Normal Attack: Foreign Ironwind
combat1.descriptionRaw:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 5 rapid strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.
combat1.description:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 5 rapid strikes.

Charged Attack
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

combat2.name: Palm Vortex
combat2.descriptionRaw: Grasping the wind's might, you form a vortex of vacuum in your palm, causing continuous Anemo DMG to opponents in front of you. The vacuum vortex explodes when the skill duration ends, causing a greater amount of Anemo DMG over a larger area. Hold DMG and AoE will gradually increase. Elemental Absorption If the vortex comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type. Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use. You discussed the way to grasp the formless wind with Paimon.
combat2.description:
Grasping the wind's might, you form a vortex of vacuum in your palm, causing continuous Anemo DMG to opponents in front of you.
The vacuum vortex explodes when the skill duration ends, causing a greater amount of Anemo DMG over a larger area.

Hold
DMG and AoE will gradually increase.

Elemental Absorption
If the vortex comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type.
Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.
combat2.flavorText: You discussed the way to grasp the formless wind with Paimon.

combat3.name: Gust Surge
combat3.descriptionRaw: Guiding the path of the wind currents, you summon a forward-moving tornado that pulls objects and opponents towards itself, dealing continuous Anemo DMG. Elemental Absorption If the tornado comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type. Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use. You and Paimon studied the flapping of a butterfly's wings.
combat3.description:
Guiding the path of the wind currents, you summon a forward-moving tornado that pulls objects and opponents towards itself, dealing continuous Anemo DMG.

Elemental Absorption
If the tornado comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type.
Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.
combat3.flavorText: You and Paimon studied the flapping of a butterfly's wings.

passive1.name: Slitting Wind
passive1.descriptionRaw: The last hit of a Normal Attack combo unleashes a wind blade, dealing 60% of ATK as <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG</color> to all opponents in its path.
passive1.description: The last hit of a Normal Attack combo unleashes a wind blade, dealing 60% of ATK as Anemo DMG to all opponents in its path.

passive2.name: Second Wind
passive2.descriptionRaw:
<color=#FFD780FF>Palm Vortex</color> kills regenerate 2% HP for 5s.
This effect can only occur once every 5s.
passive2.description:
Palm Vortex kills regenerate 2% HP for 5s.
This effect can only occur once every 5s.
